channel.title: Dominik Schacht
channel.description: The personal blog of Dominik Schacht.

item.title: A static-generated blog
item.description:
I have decided that it would be super cool and hip to switch from the wordpress blog that I hardly use to a static generated blog. I decided to use Nikola which seems simple enough to use for a blog and static pages.

The comfort I see in a static blog is that I can just push it via git to github and use that as hosting. Whenever I want to switch the hoster I just put the static files somewhere else.

This is a leading paragraph that looks very important without seeming like a hero.

This one should no longer be important
